original_text: The slaves' masters made the Israelites work quickly. They said, ‘Finish all your work for each day, as much as when we gave straw to you.’
korean_text: 감독들이 그들을 독촉하여 이르되 너희는 짚이 있을 때와 같이 그 날의 일을 그 날에 마치라 하며

sentences.original_text: The slaves' masters made the Israelites work quickly.
sentences.korean_translation: 종들의 주인들은 이스라엘 사람들이 빨리 일하게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Finish all your work for each day,
as much as when we gave straw to you.
